snippet.title: Legacy of Kain: Dead Sun Video #1
snippet.description:
Footage from Legacy of Kain: Dead Sun, the Legacy of Kain game in development at Climax Studios and cancelled by Square Enix in 2012. Read more here:
http://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=594576
